hero.title: Build the space you need
hero.subtitle: Container by container
hero.description: Design, modify and customize your desired modular container with our integrated configurator, adapted to all your needs. Perfect for living spaces, offices, guard cabins, warehouses, sanitary groups and many other individual projects.

features.title: Why choose Boxpert?
features.subtitle: Because we transform your ideas into functional, modern and durable spaces.

preview.title: 3D Real-Time Preview
preview.description: Real-time configuration and quote (except for customizations that are not in the standard lists). Create the container you need with all the elements necessary for your project and get a real-time quote!

customization.title: Quick Customization
customization.description: You quickly receive a delivery time, delivery or on-site installation options, technical support and answers to any questions related to your project!

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: 12 months warranty for all projects. Total transparency on the materials used, you receive the technical sheet of each space executed by us!

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: You can customize containers according to your project requirements or choose one of our standard containers that we have in stock and can be delivered immediately.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick response to every request and technical support in cases where you don't find the elements you want in our options list. You can contact us by email, WhatsApp or call us and we'll help you with any questions related to your desired project.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: The lowest prices on the market in Romania. Transparency in the price offer, without unexpected changes. The offer you see on the site is the final offer, the offer only varies if you want to add other extra elements.

categories.title: Explore our categories
categories.subtitle: From residential to commercial, we offer you a wide range of solutions adapted to all needs.

living.name: Living containers
living.description: Containers that can be inhabited, with all utilities ready to be connected, can replace a classic living space.

office.name: Office containers
office.description: Modern and economical spaces for your business.

testimonials.title: What do our clients say about us?
testimonials.subtitle: We don't tell you to take our word for it, but we suggest you see what some of our clients say!

cta.title: Ready to build your custom container?
cta.subtitle: Start designing with our 3D configurator or speak with our experts to discuss your specific requirements.

footer.description: Leading provider of customizable modular containers for residential, commercial, and industrial applications.

about.title: About Boxpert
about.subtitle: Pioneering the future of modular construction with innovative technology and superior craftsmanship.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2008, Boxpert began with a simple mission: to revolutionize the way people think about modular construction. What started as a small operation with a handful of containers has grown into a leading provider of customizable modular solutions.
story.p2: Today, we combine cutting-edge 3D technology with traditional craftsmanship to deliver containers that are not just functional, but beautifully designed and perfectly suited to each client's unique needs.
story.p3: With over 500 completed projects and a commitment to sustainability, we're proud to be at the forefront of the modular construction revolution.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Every container is built to the highest standards

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Your vision guides everything we create

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Eco-friendly solutions for a better tomorrow

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Let's bring your vision to life with our custom container solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to our team and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.locationSubtitle: Come see our container showroom and discuss your project in person
contact.parkingDescription: Ample parking space available for visitors

products.title: Premium Container Solutions
products.subtitle: Browse our selection of high-quality modular containers. Each unit can be customized to your exact specifications.
products.premiumQualityDesc: Built to last with high-grade materials
products.fastDeliveryDesc: Quick turnaround from order to install
products.cantFind: Can't Find What You're Looking For?
products.cantFindDesc: Every container can be fully customized. Use our 3D configurator to design your perfect solution.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore our completed projects and see what's possible with modular containers. From homes to offices, we've built it all.
portfolio.readyToCreateDesc: Start designing your custom container solution today with our interactive 3D configurator.

reviewPrompt.title: Enjoying Our Service?
reviewPrompt.description: Your feedback helps us improve and helps others find us! Would you take a moment to leave us a review on Google?

floatingActions.leaveReviewAria: Leave us a review on Google
floatingActions.whatsappMessage: Hi! I would like to know more about your container solutions.
